titleInfo.title: Letter from William Henry Wathen, Chief Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to David Wilson, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter approves of the position taken by the Resident in relation to a communication sent by Sultan bin Sugger [Sulṭān bin Saqr Āl Qāsimī], with no information as to what the position is. Instructions are given to abstain from getting involved in any disputes that are likely to arise along the Gulf coast due to the growing Wahhabi presence there.
